subject: RE: [junit] JUnit Testing for Swing JTables
msgSnippet: ... I d add a third: using a half-automatic tool like JDemo for exploratory/usability testing. Cheers, Ilja
messageBody:
junit@yahoogroups.com wrote:
> Hi Gareth,
>
> In general, there are two kinds of automation involved
> on any JComponent. They are: (i) automating the
> functionality using API methods and JUnit and (ii)
> automating the UI with JUnit extensions like JFCUnit and Abbot.

I'd add a third: using a half-automatic tool like JDemo for
exploratory/usability testing.

Cheers, Ilja
